overview: Action & Adventure, Adventures - An innocent dare to meet in a spooky cemetery ignites a fantastic adventure for four young detectives (Rebecca Keeling, Mathias Rothammer, Aled Roberts and Olivia Hallinan), who discover the grave of a famous magician and accidentally awaken the man's spirit. The plot thickens when they stumble upon a stolen diamond -- and a gang of bad guys who want the priceless gem for themselves. Can the kids get to the bottom of this magical mystery?
title: Snoopers
